overview: Songs include "Vox" (Canadian and U.S. versions), "Steaming," "Ben's Song," "The Path of Thorns," "Into the Fire," "Possession" (Canadian and U.S. versions), "Hold On," "Good Enough," "I Will Remember You," "Building A Mystery," "Sweet Surrender," and "Adia."
title: Sarah McLachlan: Video Collection 1989-1998
